baseListing.title: Witnessd
baseListing.description:
Witnessd provides cryptographic authorship witnessing with keystroke biometrics. It creates tamper-evident proof of document creation timeline, helping writers, creators, and professionals establish authentic authorship evidence.

Key Features:

• Cryptographic Checkpoints: Create verifiable snapshots of your work at any time with VDF (Verifiable Delay Function) proofs that mathematically prove minimum elapsed time between commits.

• Keystroke Biometrics: Non-invasive keystroke timing analysis creates unique behavioral fingerprints without capturing actual keystrokes. Your privacy is protected - only timing patterns are recorded.

• Tamper-Evident Evidence: All evidence is cryptographically chained. Any modification to the chain is mathematically detectable.

• Export & Verify: Generate evidence packets that can be independently verified by anyone, anywhere, without requiring special software.

• Privacy-First Design: No cloud uploads required. All data stays on your device. No accounts needed.

Use Cases:
• Writers proving original authorship
• Researchers documenting creation timeline
• Creators establishing prior art
• Professionals protecting intellectual property
• Legal evidence of document provenance

Technical Excellence:
• Built with Go for performance and reliability
• Uses Ed25519 signatures for cryptographic proof
• VDF proofs based on SHA-256 iteration chains
• Optional TPM hardware binding for enhanced security
• Open source and auditable

Patent Pending: USPTO Application No. 19/460,364
